attributes.additional_details: Because it’s simple biology , less sun( there’s very little sun as it is in the UK !) less photosynthesis! The govt is still encouraging the covering of huge amounts of agricultural land with solar panels to produce electricity with sunlight! And now they want to dim it! Stop this  madness!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701963
